description: GOLD layer - Combined FDA NDC and RxNORM product codesets with unified prefixes

schedule.description: Run after silver layers complete (10 AM UTC daily)

data_quality.note: Each record must have EITHER fda_ndc_11 OR rxnorm_rxcui (or both)

join_strategy: FULL OUTER JOIN fda-all-ndc with rxnorm-products via RXNSAT.NDC attribute

field_conventions.fda_prefix: All FDA fields prefixed with fda_
field_conventions.rxnorm_prefix: All RxNORM fields prefixed with rxnorm_
